description:
Benjamin is really shy and quiet. If you saw him on the street you wouldn't guess that he has a very voracious sexual appetite because he's so reserved.
I knew from our first conversation that he likes to get fucked by big cocks. I also remember asking him what brings him out of his shell, and I never really got an answer, just a nervous laugh.
Well, now I know. Get a big dick up his ass and Benjamin gets loud.
I asked him whom he wanted to be with for his first video and he quickly said "Ajay!"
title: Benjamin and Ajay
